channel.title: Name and owner of server
channel.description: How do u change the name of server and owner of server at the top of the screen and when u log out? Plz help

item.title: Name and owner of server
item.dc:creator: @Pking_Dragon Pking Dragon
item.description:
@Pking_Dragon wrote:

Just incase you don’t understand what he’s saying, which I’m sure you do… it’s the first 3 letters, such as @gre@ etc, just like runescape classic if you’ve played that. Say you were wanting to it to says PureStr in red… It’s be @red@PureStr… Just clearing it up incase you didn’t understand.

Read full topic

item.title: Name and owner of server
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Go into client.java and search for whatever it says. Change it to whatever you wan’t. For example, underneath the ‘skull’ in Phonescape, it says “Phone”. To find this you would just search “Phone” in client.java, you would see this

public int WildyLevel = 0; public int leftwild = 0; public boolean InWildrange = false; public void WriteWildyLevel() { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@cya@Phone", 199); }

To change what it says you would simply change the “@cya@Phone”. @cya@ being the colour.

Read full topic
